name: jest-test-each
description: run parametrised tests easily [typesafe] without text tables or arrays of arrays.
author: Taisia Pitko (mmisty) <minydas@yandex.ru>

scripts.prepublish: pretty-quick && rm -rf dist/ && tsc && cd ./_tests && yarn test && cd ../_test-e2e && yarn && rm -rf ./node_modules/jest-test-each/dist && cp -R ../dist ./node_modules/jest-test-each/ && yarn test
